actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources and Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to amend the Mineral Lands Leasing Act of 1920, as amended, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Competitive Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1987

summary.text: Federal Competitive Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1987 - Amends the Federal Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1976 to prohibit the issuance or assignment of competitive coal leases to an entity engaged in the extraction or production of coal reserves in a foreign country for importation into the United States.

titles.title: Federal Competitive Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Mineral Lands Leasing Act of 1920, as amended, and for other purposes.
